'''''Aiglos 15''''' is a regular Polish language issue of '''''[[Aiglos (journal)|Aiglos]]'''''.<ref>''Aiglos''' 15 official page in Polish http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/numer15.php (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref><ref>''Aiglos''' 15 official page in English http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/english/issue15.php (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref>
{{AiglosNav|14|16}}
==Contents==
{{AiglosTransl}}
* '''Cover Art'''
** ''Resurrection''
*** By: [[Jef Murray]]

* '''Articles and essays'''
** "A Hero Comes to the King, or How Geology Helps to Talk about Epic"
*** By: Maria Błaszkiewicz
** "Seven for the Dwarf-lords..."
*** By: Magdalena Kudelska 'Geirve'
** "J.R.R. Tolkien and the Atlantis Myth, or the Usefulness of Dreams and Myth-making"
*** By: [[Michał Leśniewski|Michał Leśniewski 'M.L.']]
** "The Lord of Fate and the Ring-bearer. Destiny and Free Will in Middle-earth of the First and Third Ages
*** By: Tadeusz Andrzej Olszański 'Halbarad Dúnadan'
** "Mythopoetic Fantasy. J.R.R. Tolkien and the Legendarium of Middle-earth"
*** By: Marek Pustowaruk

* '''Fanfiction and poetry'''
** ''Eight Elven Cloaks''
*** By: Virtuella
** ''The Archives of Michel Delving Messenger Service''
*** By: Zosia Stanecka 'Nasturcja Gamgee'
** ''Amroth and Nimrodel''
*** By: Katarzyna Wojdak 'Avari'
** Poetry by: Katarzyna Wojdak 'Avari', Anna Adamczyk-Śliwińska 'Nifrodel', Agata Borkowska 'Alqualaurë' and [[Marcin Morawski|Marcin Morawski 'Lómendil']].
** Riddles
*** By: Katarzyna Wojdak 'Avari'
** Tolkien humour
*** By: [[Catherine Karina Chmiel|'Kasiopea']]
** Crossword puzzle with a twist
*** By: [[Karolina Stopa-Olszańska|Karolina Stopa-Olszańska 'Melinir']]

* '''Reviews and interviews'''
** An interview with [[Alex Lewis]], a long-standing chairman of [[The Tolkien Society]]
*** By: Michał Leśniewski 'M.L.' 
** L.E. Jones, ''Myth and Middle-earth, Exploring the Legends Behind J.R.R. Tolkien’s The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings'' ("Second-rate Writing, or How to Make Money on Tolkien")
*** By: Anna Adamczyk-Śliwińska 'Nifrodel'
** J.R.R. Tolkien, ''O Tuorze i upadku Gondolinu. Narn e'Dant Gondolin'' ("A Few words on Some Reconstruction")
*** by - [[Karolina Stopa-Olszańska|Karolina Stopa-Olszańska 'Melinir']]
** Report on Tricon ([[Polcon]], [[Eurocon]], and Parcon in one, 26-29 [[August]] [[2010]], Cieszyn, Poland)
*** By: Michał Leśniewski 'M.L.'

* '''Illustrations'''
** By: [[Jef Murray]] (cover)
** By: Basia Śliwińska 'Vilva'
** By: [[Catherine Karina Chmiel|'Kasiopea']]
** By: Līga Kļaviņa
** By: [[Karolina Stopa-Olszańska|Karolina Stopa-Olszańska 'Melinir']]
** By: Katarzyna Wojdak 'Avari'
